alert.note: Alert for Garden; Sheridan (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 6:29PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Garden and south central Sheridan Counties through 615 PM MDT... At 529 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southeast of Antioch, or 19 miles southeast of Alliance, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Crescent Lake National Wildlife Refuge, Richardson Lake, Miles Lake, Mumper, Patterson Lake, Lakeside, Herman Lake, Deer Lake, Adams Flats, Britton Lake and Tralnor Lake. This includes the following highways... Highway 250 between mile markers 1 and 2. Highway 2 between mile markers 107 and 112. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
